description: The best part is you can continue tracking the same task, and it also track your start and stop time. The best of the best. The UI is very beautiful. Love love this app so much. Thank you dev, 10/10.
summary: The best time tracking app in the market!

description: useful timer for simple tasks export is available.
Furtherance is a simple and intuitive offline time tracker. Think of it as a stopwatch with metadata. For my purposes, it works perfectly.
summary: Offline time tracking with an intuitive interface
